channel.title: Raspberry on Mudler blog
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry on Mudler blog

item.title: Updates: Rpi2 joins to testing boards, Mate testing repository, Sabayon devkit
item.description: Updates, TMiD (This Month in the Dev world) Something landed here! Thanks to +Ben RobertsÂ for the donation! ARM Marsala, the board that +Ben Roberts was so kind to donate has just landed here, and i’m very happy about it, because that means that i can test against the board again myself. I’m glad also to announce that the ROS framework and some other goodies(among of them firefox and libreoffice) have been pushed into our ARM repo.
